column5: very sorry young man who totally underestimated the girth
column8: of a Deep Dish from the Windy City! There was some discussion about which spot was the place to experience the Deep Dish on our way down
column9: however our concierge from the Sax Hotel convinced us that Lou's was the place to go
column10: and once we considered our options she handed us a slip for a complimentary Bruschetta. Awesome
